snippet: Adam E. Livix was charged with weapons possession, and Israeli officials said he had considered attacking Islamic holy sites.
abstract: Israeli officials say Texas man Adam E Livix is being charged with illegal possession of weapons after he said he considered committing terrorist attacks, including on Islamic holy sites.
lead_paragraph: Adam E. Livix was charged with weapons possession, and Israeli officials said he had considered attacking Islamic holy sites.

headline.main: Texas Man Charged in Israel May Have Sought to Attack Holy Sites
headline.print_headline: Israel: Texas Man Accused in Arms Case
